knimeNode.name: PMML Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Can predict the data using the PMML object.

fullDescription.intro: Can predict the following PMML models: ClusteringModel, GeneralRegressionModel, RegressionModel, TreeModel , RegressionTreeModel (Simple Regression Tree), GradientBoostingModel (Gradient Boosted Trees), SupportVectorMachineModel and NeuralNetwork
